original_solution_mapping.L1: After the first spray kills 50% of germs, there will be 100 - 50 = <<100-50=50>>50% left.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The second spray kills 25%, but 5% have already been killed by the 50% spray, so it kills 25 - 5 = <<25-5=20>>20%.
original_solution_mapping.L3: After the second spray kills 20% of the remaining germs, there will be 50 - 20 = <<50-20=30>>30% left.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 142.
    Returns: the percentage of germs left after using both sanitizer sprays.
    """
    # L1
    total_percentage = 100 # WK
    first_spray_kill_percentage = 50 # 50% of germs
    remaining_after_first_spray = total_percentage - first_spray_kill_percentage

    # L2
    second_spray_kill_percentage = 25 # 25% of germs
    overlap_kill_percentage = 5 # 5% of the germs they kill are the same ones
    effective_second_spray_kill_percentage = second_spray_kill_percentage - overlap_kill_percentage

    # L3
    final_percentage_left = remaining_after_first_spray - effective_second_spray_kill_percentage

    # FA
    answer = final_percentage_left
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After the first spray kills {first_spray_kill_percentage}% of germs, there will be {total_percentage} - {first_spray_kill_percentage} = <<{total_percentage}-{first_spray_kill_percentage}={remaining_after_first_spray}>>{remaining_after_first_spray}% left.

The second spray kills {second_spray_kill_percentage}%, but {overlap_kill_percentage}% have already been killed by the 50% spray, so it kills {second_spray_kill_percentage} - {overlap_kill_percentage} = <<{second_spray_kill_percentage}-{overlap_kill_percentage}={effective_second_spray_kill_percentage}>>{effective_second_spray_kill_percentage}%.

After the second spray kills {effective_second_spray_kill_percentage}% of the remaining germs, there will be {remaining_after_first_spray} - {effective_second_spray_kill_percentage} = <<{remaining_after_first_spray}-{effective_second_spray_kill_percentage}={final_percentage_left}>>{final_percentage_left}% left.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: After the first spray kills 50% of germs, there will be 100 - 50 = <<100-50=50>>50% left.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The second spray kills 25%, but 5% have already been killed by the 50% spray, so it kills 25 - 5 = <<25-5=20>>20%.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: After the second spray kills 20% of the remaining germs, there will be 50 - 20 = <<50-20=70>>70% left.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
